summary: Peter Parker, swinging into Stark Tower: Hey Jarvis  JARVIS: Yes, Mr Parker?  Peter, snickering: Does Tony Stark is gay? ...
body:
Peter Parker, swinging into Stark Tower: Hey Jarvis

JARVIS: Yes, Mr Parker?

Peter, snickering: Does Tony Stark is gay?

JARVIS: Tony Stark is gay is the most discussed in the media in the few years ago. Even it has happened in 2008, but some of the public still curious about what is exactly happening and to be the reason there is a rumor comes out about his gay. At that time he became the massive social networking rumor. The public, especially his fans are shocked. He just came out with his bad rumor which is spread massively. This time is not about his philanthropist career, but his bad rumor. The rumor is out of standardize of hoax, according the last reported this playboy revealed himself as homosexual. Do you still believe or not, this rumor is really much talked by people even in a person of his fans.

Peter: omg

summary:
Peter: um, hi MJ, will you, um, well want to, go out with me some time?
MJ: sodium
Peter: you’re copper and tellurium
MJ:...
body:
Peter: um, hi MJ, will you, um, well want to, go out with me some time?

MJ: sodium

Peter: you’re copper and tellurium

MJ: Copper, Cu, tellurium… Te. Cute

Peter: never mind, see ya

MJ: POTASSIUM, I meant potassium!

summary: Peter bringing Ned around the compound: Oh yeah me and Tony hang out all the time I’ve called him dad a couple times it’s no...
body:
Peter bringing Ned around the compound: Oh yeah me and Tony hang out all the time I’ve called him dad a couple times it’s no biggy we’re bros

Tony walks by: Hey kid

Peter getting flustered: HI MR. STARK SO HAPPY TO BE HERE HEY DO YOU THINK I COULD GO ON THE NEXT AVENGERS MISSION MAYBE?????

Tony: No

Peter:………yeah it’s cool

summary:
Peter: Hey Shuri, I just realised your brother is a furry!
Shuri: What's a furry?
Peter: It's someone who enjoys going around...
body:
Peter: Hey Shuri, I just realised your brother is a furry!

Shuri: What’s a furry?

Peter: It’s someone who enjoys going around dressed as an animal.

Shuri: But… wouldn’t that make you a furry too?

Peter: WAIT NO I MEAN-

blog.name: fuckyeahx-23
blog.title: Target X
blog.description:
X-23 is the product of a top-secret project that attempted to recreate the original Weapon X. Cloned from a damaged DNA sample of Wolverine, X-23 was programmed to be the perfect killing machine.

She goes by Laura Kinney, a name given to her by her genetic creator/surrogate mother, Sarah Kinney.

Her official X-Men codename - before Wolverine - was Talon.

X-23 was created by Craig Kyle and Chris Yost, and first appeared on X-Men: Evolution.

If we post your art and you want it credited differently/taken down, please message us.

NSFW tags: #seX-23 and #sniktcest

blog.name: ashc-from-ao3
blog.title: Reading, Writing And Creating Too Many Ocs
blog.description:
Requests are open. Feeling a little lack of inspiration for my series so send in some stuff

Master list

Fandom list

Bones

Doctor Who

Eragon

Harry Potter

Once Upon a Time

Marvel (MCU,Netflix Marvel,X-Men, original Fantastic 4, all Spidermen characters)

Narnia

Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children (movie version only for now)

Pirates of the Caribbean

Star Trek (OS,TNG,DS9,Voyager,enterprise,AOS)

Sherlock

supernatural

Various others I can't think of right now. Ask and I'll let you know if I do it

read all my stories on AO3:

⚡️http://archiveofourown.org/users/Ashc/works⚡️

🔮🔮

☠

body:
Fluff Alphabet:Peter Parker (Tom Holland)

A - Attractive (what they find attractive)

Peter finds courage attractive. Someone who isn’t afraid to stand up for the small guy, or the big guy if they needs it. He also finds intelligence attractive. It doesn’t have to be academic intelligence either, blow the boy away with random facts or street smarts and he’s wearing heart eye glasses

B - Baby (do they want a family?)

Yes, yes he does. He’s such a family person. He wants to wait until he finds the perfect person though. Be it a man, woman or otherwise he wants someone he knows he can raise children with. Of course, if he was with someone who didn’t want kids he’d never pressure them

C - Cuddle (how they cuddle)

He will either wrap around you like a koala or he’ll pull you down to lay on top of him. He loves holding you and it makes him feel like he can keep you safe. After a hard night out however he’ll often curl up on top of you, you can’t resist petting his hair until he falls asleep like that.

D - Dates (what dates with them are like)

Peter tries to make his dates romantic, unfortunately if an emergency pops up this can make things hard. This situation can go one of two ways. If you know he’s Spider-Man you’ll kiss him on the cheek and tell him to go be a hero. If you don’t know he’ll text Ned to fake an emergency and he’ll apologize over and over again while getting ready to go. He’ll already be planning a make up date either way

E - Everything (you are my…)

to peter you’re his reason to keep fighting. When things get hard and he’s not sure he can continue being Spider-Man knowing he’s making the city a little safer for you makes everything worth while for him. Being able to see your smile and be able to just be near you makes him want to fight anyone and everyone who might threaten you

F - Feelings (when they realise that they love you)

Don’t hate me….he realized he loved you when he was turning to ash. He may have verbally apologized to Tony but that “I’m sorry” was really for you. He was sorry there’d be no more dates, sorry he wouldn’t get to kiss to again, wouldn’t be able to see you again. He was sorry he couldn’t one day ask you to marry him or to move in with him. These thoughts were what made him realize in his final moments he was head over heels in love with you. He just hopped you’d meet in another life so he could do it again

G - Gentle (are they gentle?)

He’s the gentles person ever, soft touched, soft kisses, soft cuddles. He never wants to make you feel pressured so everything he does is gentle and caring

H - Hand/hold (how do they hold you? Do they hold hands?)

Peter holds hands any opportunity given to him, he’ll lace your fingers together and squeeze while smiling like a dork at you.

I - Impression (first impression)

His first impression was that you were quiet but clever. You has just snarked to a teacher over a wrong fact and he couldn’t believe his ears. Your first impression was that he was a dork, a cute one to. You had heard about his new LEGO Death Star and immediately thought it was adorable

J - Joker (do they pull pranks?)

He’ll pull harmless pranks, like a mosquito buzzing playing on his phone while you try to find it. Or leaving fake bugs and things (often spiders) where you’ll almost step on them, only to dance away in surprise. Of course he’ll only do it if he knows it won’t seriously bother you or cause anything serious to happen

K - Kisses (how they kiss)

Peter will kiss in many different ways. Sometimes he’ll pout until you kiss him, other times he’ll pull you in for a hug, kissing your forehead, cheeks then finally your lips.

L - Little things (what little things they love)

He loves how you look when you’re concentrated, the little ticks you have are all so adorable to him. Funnily enough your favourite dates are homework dates, you’ll both catch each other deep in concentration and just stop for a moment because it’s too cute to ignore

M - Memory (favourite memory together)

Peter’s favourite memory was when you went on your first date. It was supposed to be a trip to the nearby icecream shop but something much batter had caught your eye. You had ended up on a completely impromptu date but he wouldn’t have changed a thing

N - Nickel (do they spoil?)

He spoils you as much as he can, little things he thinks you’ll like. Adorable voicemails, homemade presents. Anything he can give to you that he knows you’ll like

O - Orange (what color reminds them of you)

Red reminds him of you. It’s the primary colour of his suit, the thing that keeps him safe in one way or another. You keep him safe to, in a different but possibly more effective way, red also reminds him of you because you’ve made you way into his heart and are staying.

P - Petnames (what petnames they use)

You call him Pete, love, darling.

He calls you sweetheart, cutie, and babe

Q - Questions ( what are the questions they’re always asking?)

Peter likes to make sure you’re okay with everything he’s doing so he’s always asking to make sure. “Is this okay?” “may I do this?”

R - Remember (their favourite memory of each other)

His favourite memory of you was when you had a movie night. You had been stressed out over finals for a while and he had suggested a movie to help you relax. Halfway through he looked down and you were fast asleep on his lap.

Your favourite memory was soon after this. You had woken up during the credits to find peter asleep this time. Head tilted to the side, mouth open, little snores. It was the cutest. You wished you’d had the brain power to take a picture

S - Sad ( how they cheer themselves/others up)

Peter will put on ridiculous puppet shows for you. He’ll use nothing but some silly voices and his hands. The effort he puts into them and the silly stories he tells always cheer you up.

He cheers himself up by thinking of you, May, Ned. The people he loves. He can’t possibly stay upset when he’s thinking about your smile, or Ned’s ridiculous Spider-Man questions or how much May “Larbs” him

T - Talking ( what they love to talk about)

He loves to talk about the avengers and his hero work. But only if you know who he is. If not he keeps those topics to Ned and instead will geek out about something with you instead. Either way he gets way too adorably excited.

U - Universe ( a metaphor)

The stars in the sky don’t shine as brightly as you

V - Very ( thoughts about each other)

You think he’s very brave, if not for being Spider-Man than for not being afraid to be who he is.

W - Why ( reasons why they love you)

He loves you because you’re special, you’re unique and he adores that. He also adores that you adore Spider-Man, if you know who’s behind the mask or not he thinks it’s adorable

X - Xylophone (what’s their song?)

I just called by Stevie Wonder

Y - You (what you are to them)

You’re his everything, his reason to fight, his sun and stars. He can’t think of enough ways to describe what you are to him

Z - Zebra ( what pet they want to have)

He would love a spider dog. Something he can come home to and have it be all wiggy and excited. Something he knows can also protect May while he’s gone off to do his hero work

W - Why ( reasons why they love you)

He loves you because you’re special, you’re unique and he adores that. He also adores that you adore Spider-Man, if you know who’s behind the mask or not he thinks it’s adorable

X - Xylophone (what’s their song?)

I just called by Stevie Wonder

Y - You (what you are to them)

You’re his everything, his reason to fight, his sun and stars. He can’t think of enough ways to describe what you are to him

Z - Zebra ( what pet they want to have)

He would love a spider dog. Something he can come home to and have it be all wiggy and excited. Something he knows can also protect May while he’s gone off to do his hero work

trail.content_raw:
Fluff Alphabet:Peter Parker (Tom Holland)

A - Attractive (what they find attractive)

Peter finds courage attractive. Someone who isn’t afraid to stand up for the small guy, or the big guy if they needs it. He also finds intelligence attractive. It doesn’t have to be academic intelligence either, blow the boy away with random facts or street smarts and he’s wearing heart eye glasses

B - Baby (do they want a family?)

Yes, yes he does. He’s such a family person. He wants to wait until he finds the perfect person though. Be it a man, woman or otherwise he wants someone he knows he can raise children with. Of course, if he was with someone who didn’t want kids he’d never pressure them

C - Cuddle (how they cuddle)

He will either wrap around you like a koala or he’ll pull you down to lay on top of him. He loves holding you and it makes him feel like he can keep you safe. After a hard night out however he’ll often curl up on top of you, you can’t resist petting his hair until he falls asleep like that.

D - Dates (what dates with them are like)

Peter tries to make his dates romantic, unfortunately if an emergency pops up this can make things hard. This situation can go one of two ways. If you know he’s Spider-Man you’ll kiss him on the cheek and tell him to go be a hero. If you don’t know he’ll text Ned to fake an emergency and he’ll apologize over and over again while getting ready to go. He’ll already be planning a make up date either way

E - Everything (you are my…)

to peter you’re his reason to keep fighting. When things get hard and he’s not sure he can continue being Spider-Man knowing he’s making the city a little safer for you makes everything worth while for him. Being able to see your smile and be able to just be near you makes him want to fight anyone and everyone who might threaten you

F - Feelings (when they realise that they love you)

Don’t hate me….he realized he loved you when he was turning to ash. He may have verbally apologized to Tony but that “I’m sorry” was really for you. He was sorry there’d be no more dates, sorry he wouldn’t get to kiss to again, wouldn’t be able to see you again. He was sorry he couldn’t one day ask you to marry him or to move in with him. These thoughts were what made him realize in his final moments he was head over heels in love with you. He just hopped you’d meet in another life so he could do it again

G - Gentle (are they gentle?)

He’s the gentles person ever, soft touched, soft kisses, soft cuddles. He never wants to make you feel pressured so everything he does is gentle and caring

H - Hand/hold (how do they hold you? Do they hold hands?)

Peter holds hands any opportunity given to him, he’ll lace your fingers together and squeeze while smiling like a dork at you.

I - Impression (first impression)

His first impression was that you were quiet but clever. You has just snarked to a teacher over a wrong fact and he couldn’t believe his ears. Your first impression was that he was a dork, a cute one to. You had heard about his new LEGO Death Star and immediately thought it was adorable

J - Joker (do they pull pranks?)

He’ll pull harmless pranks, like a mosquito buzzing playing on his phone while you try to find it. Or leaving fake bugs and things (often spiders) where you’ll almost step on them, only to dance away in surprise. Of course he’ll only do it if he knows it won’t seriously bother you or cause anything serious to happen

K - Kisses (how they kiss)

Peter will kiss in many different ways. Sometimes he’ll pout until you kiss him, other times he’ll pull you in for a hug, kissing your forehead, cheeks then finally your lips.

L - Little things (what little things they love)

He loves how you look when you’re concentrated, the little ticks you have are all so adorable to him. Funnily enough your favourite dates are homework dates, you’ll both catch each other deep in concentration and just stop for a moment because it’s too cute to ignore

M - Memory (favourite memory together)

Peter’s favourite memory was when you went on your first date. It was supposed to be a trip to the nearby icecream shop but something much batter had caught your eye. You had ended up on a completely impromptu date but he wouldn’t have changed a thing

N - Nickel (do they spoil?)

He spoils you as much as he can, little things he thinks you’ll like. Adorable voicemails, homemade presents. Anything he can give to you that he knows you’ll like

O - Orange (what color reminds them of you)

Red reminds him of you. It’s the primary colour of his suit, the thing that keeps him safe in one way or another. You keep him safe to, in a different but possibly more effective way, red also reminds him of you because you’ve made you way into his heart and are staying.

P - Petnames (what petnames they use)

You call him Pete, love, darling.

He calls you sweetheart, cutie, and babe

Q - Questions ( what are the questions they’re always asking?)

Peter likes to make sure you’re okay with everything he’s doing so he’s always asking to make sure. “Is this okay?” “may I do this?”

R - Remember (their favourite memory of each other)

His favourite memory of you was when you had a movie night. You had been stressed out over finals for a while and he had suggested a movie to help you relax. Halfway through he looked down and you were fast asleep on his lap.

Your favourite memory was soon after this. You had woken up during the credits to find peter asleep this time. Head tilted to the side, mouth open, little snores. It was the cutest. You wished you’d had the brain power to take a picture

S - Sad ( how they cheer themselves/others up)

Peter will put on ridiculous puppet shows for you. He’ll use nothing but some silly voices and his hands. The effort he puts into them and the silly stories he tells always cheer you up.

He cheers himself up by thinking of you, May, Ned. The people he loves. He can’t possibly stay upset when he’s thinking about your smile, or Ned’s ridiculous Spider-Man questions or how much May “Larbs” him

T - Talking ( what they love to talk about)

He loves to talk about the avengers and his hero work. But only if you know who he is. If not he keeps those topics to Ned and instead will geek out about something with you instead. Either way he gets way too adorably excited.

U - Universe ( a metaphor)

The stars in the sky don’t shine as brightly as you

V - Very ( thoughts about each other)

You think he’s very brave, if not for being Spider-Man than for not being afraid to be who he is.

W - Why ( reasons why they love you)

He loves you because you’re special, you’re unique and he adores that. He also adores that you adore Spider-Man, if you know who’s behind the mask or not he thinks it’s adorable

X - Xylophone (what’s their song?)

I just called by Stevie Wonder

Y - You (what you are to them)

You’re his everything, his reason to fight, his sun and stars. He can’t think of enough ways to describe what you are to him

Z - Zebra ( what pet they want to have)

He would love a spider dog. Something he can come home to and have it be all wiggy and excited. Something he knows can also protect May while he’s gone off to do his hero work

blog.name: gayshipsanddadjokes
blog.title: Gay Ships And Dad Jokes
blog.description: Work hard gay hard. She/her pronouns, lesbian

summary:
Peter: Mr Stark can you remove my bones?
Tony: Why would you want that.
Peter: I could like... wiggle. Like jelly.
Tony: I could...
body:
Peter: Mr Stark can you remove my bones?

Tony: Why would you want that.

Peter: I could like… wiggle. Like jelly.

Tony: I could in theory.

reblog.comment:
Peter: Mr Stark can you remove my bones?

Tony: Why would you want that.

Peter: I could like… wiggle. Like jelly.

Tony: I could in theory.

trail.content_raw:
Peter: Mr Stark can you remove my bones?

Tony: Why would you want that.

Peter: I could like… wiggle. Like jelly.

Tony: I could in theory.
trail.content:
Peter: Mr Stark can you remove my bones?

Tony: Why would you want that.

Peter: I could like… wiggle. Like jelly.

Tony: I could in theory.

blog.name: alienslikedmyfantasy
blog.title: I am lost for words
blog.description: Mostly Reblogs, Just a Geek, Confused 24/7

body:
Cosplay Bodysuit Pattern Blank

I was wondering if there was a way to get a free blank pattern that I could draw my design onto it and hopefully get it printed so I could wear it. (It’s a female spiderman suit). Any advice is greatly appreciated.
